<voice 00201_19001476><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>阿洛德，我來介紹一下。

24693.<voice 00260_00024693><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00260_00024693><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>他是阿洛德，

24694.<voice 00329_00024694><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00329_00024694><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>很重要的……青梅竹馬。<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>

880.<voice 00789_00000880><start_lip_sync n0:

882.<voice 00889_00000882><start_lip_sync n0:

19001470.<voice 04085_19001470><start_lip_sync n0:
